content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. Let's try to get the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm looking for the lowest price as a student. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
